"Why are they down on me?" thought Tu- shin, looking in alarm at his superior. 
"I ... don't . . ." he muttered, holding up two fingers to his cap. "I . . ." 
But the staff officer did not finish what he

wanted to say. A cannon ball, flying close to him, caused him to duck and bend over his horse. He paused, and just as he was about to say something more, another ball stopped him. He turned his horse and galloped off.
